mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, role_status, create_time, update_time from tm_role where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select r.role_id, r.role_name, ur.user_id from tm_role r left join tr_user_role ur on r.role_id = ur.role_id and ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and r.role_status = 'Y' order by r.role_id
mapper.delete: delete from tm_role where role_id in #{ids}
mapper.insert: insert into tm_role (role_id, role_name, role_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())
insert into tr_role_right (role_id, right_id) select #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, right_id from tm_right where right_id in (${rightIds})
mapper.update: update tm_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_status = #{roleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
